name: Windows Gather Spark IM Password Extraction
author: Brandon McCann "zeknox" <bmccann@accuvant.com>
Thomas McCarthy "smilingraccoon" <smilingraccoon@gmail.com>
description:
This module will enumerate passwords stored by the Spark IM client.
          The encryption key is publicly known. This module will not only extract encrypted
          password but will also decrypt password using public key.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
